title: Open Google button directly to Gmail + deliver full project source

requirements.text: Update the "Continue with Google" link/button on the Login/Signup screen so clicking it opens Gmail directly (https://mail.google.com) in a new tab instead of opening the Google Account signup page.

quotes: it to going to google account and asking to create email account. instead it should go to the gmail account directly
it should go to the gmail account directly

acceptanceCriteria: On AuthScreen, the anchor used by the "Continue with Google" button no longer points to https://accounts.google.com/signup.
Clicking the button opens https://mail.google.com in a new browser tab (target="_blank") with rel="noopener noreferrer" preserved.
The button text remains "Continue with Google" (use existing i18n key continue_with_google; do not add or change translations).

requirements.text: Provide/export the full project source code as a complete, buildable project (frontend + backend) reflecting the Gmail-link change.
acceptanceCriteria: The delivered output includes the complete frontend and backend directories (including configuration files like frontend/.env.example) needed to run/build the app.
No files are omitted that are required to install dependencies and start the app using the projectâ€™s existing tooling.
The included source matches the implemented change where the Google button opens https://mail.google.com.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Use English for any new user-facing text; do not modify existing translation values for existing i18n keys.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; only introduce migration.mo if an actual state upgrade is required.
nonGoals: Implementing real Google OAuth / "Sign in with Google" authentication flow.
Any changes to payment, generation, pricing, routing, theming, or i18n beyond what is necessary to change the external link destination.
Using the uploaded screenshot (image-1.png) in the app UI unless explicitly requested.
